channel.title: CVE Feed for Phoenix -- SecureCore™ Technology™ 4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Phoenix -- SecureCore™ Technology™ 4

item.title: CVE-2023-31100|2024-08-02T14:45:25.673Z -- phoenix -- securecore%E2%84%A2%20technology%E2%84%A2%204
item.description:
Improper Access Control in SMI handler vulnerability in Phoenix SecureCore™ Technology™ 4 allows SPI flash modification. This issue affects SecureCore™ Technology™ 4:
* from 4.3.0.0 before 4.3.0.203 *
from
4.3.1.0 before 4.3.1.163 *
from
4.4.0.0 before 4.4.0.217 *
from
4.5.0.0 before 4.5.0.138

item.title: CVE-2023-5058|2024-08-02T07:44:53.613Z -- phoenix -- securecore%E2%84%A2%20technology%E2%84%A2%204
item.description: Improper Input Validation in the processing of user-supplied splash screen during system boot in Phoenix SecureCore™ Technology™ 4 potentially allows denial-of-service attacks or arbitrary code execution.
